constantValues: Activity that tracks call outcome and number of pages for a fax and optionally stores an electronic copy of the document.

definitions.description: Activity that tracks call outcome and number of pages for a fax and optionally stores an electronic copy of the document.

foreignKeyAttribute.explanation: Place holder that merges with the better attribute description from the ActivityCommon entity
foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

members.name: coverPageName

constantValues: Type the name of the cover page to use when sending the fax.

members.description: Type the name of the cover page to use when sending the fax.

members.name: billingCode

constantValues: Type the billing code for the fax to make sure the fax is charged to the correct sender or customer account.

members.description: Type the billing code for the fax to make sure the fax is charged to the correct sender or customer account.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder}

members.name: stateCode

constantValues: Shows whether the fax activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled fax activities are read-only and can't be edited.

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'stateCode_display' is added to the 'Fax' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'stateCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: stateCode_display

members.description: Shows whether the fax activity is open, completed, or canceled. Completed and canceled fax activities are read-only and can't be edited.

members.name: numberOfPages

constantValues: Type the number of pages included in the fax.

members.description: Type the number of pages included in the fax.

members.name: description

constantValues: Type additional information to describe the fax, such as the primary message or the products and services featured.

members.description: Type additional information to describe the fax, such as the primary message or the products and services featured.

members.name: tsid

constantValues: Type the Transmitting Subscriber ID (TSID) associated with a send action. This is typically a combination of the recipient's fax or phone number and company name.

members.description: Type the Transmitting Subscriber ID (TSID) associated with a send action. This is typically a combination of the recipient's fax or phone number and company name.

entityReference.explanation: The constantValues below correspond to the attributes of the 'listLookupCorrelatedValues' entityShape which are: {languageTag, displayText, attributeValue, displayOrder, correlatedValue}

addSupportingAttribute.explanation: This attribute 'statusCode_display' is added to the 'Fax' entity to provide the localized display text for the value of the listLookup attribute 'statusCode'
addSupportingAttribute.name: statusCode_display

members.name: isBilled

constantValues: Information regarding whether the fax activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

members.description: Information regarding whether the fax activity was billed as part of resolving a case.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

members.name: exchangeRate

constantValues: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

members.name: processId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the process.

members.description: Shows the ID of the process.

members.name: stageId

constantValues: Shows the ID of the stage.

members.description: Shows the ID of the stage.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the fax record.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the fax record.

foreignKeyAttribute.name: id

constantValues: Last SLA that was applied to this fax. This field is for internal use only.

foreignKeyAttribute.description: Last SLA that was applied to this fax. This field is for internal use only.

members.name: onHoldTime

constantValues: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.description: Shows how long, in minutes, that the record was on hold.

members.name: lastOnHoldTime

constantValues: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.

members.description: Contains the date and time stamp of the last on hold time.
